name: @microfox/veo-on-vertex-ai
title: Veo on Vertex AI SDK
description: The Veo on Vertex AI SDK provides a simple interface for generating videos using the Veo API on Google Cloud's Vertex AI platform.  Use this SDK to create, monitor, and manage video generation jobs.

readme_map.title: Veo on Vertex AI SDK
readme_map.description: The full README for the Veo on Vertex AI SDK

all_readmes.description: A factory function that creates and returns a new instance of the `VeoonVertexAIAPISdk` client. This is the recommended way to instantiate the SDK.
Fetches the current status of a long-running video generation operation. This allows you to check if the task is still in progress, has completed successfully, or has failed.

Initiates a long-running operation to generate a video based on a text prompt and/or an initial image. This function sends a request to the specified Veo model on Vertex AI and returns an operation name that can be used to track the progress of the video generation.

Polls a long-running video generation operation until it is complete or a timeout is reached. It repeatedly calls `fetchOperationStatus` at a specified interval, simplifying the process of waiting for a result.

Initializes a new instance of the `VeoonVertexAIAPISdk` client. This constructor sets up the configuration required to communicate with the Veo on Vertex AI API, including the Google Cloud project ID and location. It's recommended to use the `createVeoonVertexAIAPISDK` factory function for creating instances of the SDK.

constructors.name: VeoonVertexAIAPISdk
constructors.description: Create a new Veo on Vertex AI SDK client through which you can interact with the API

requiredKeys.description: Your Google Cloud project ID. This is required to identify the project to use for Vertex AI services.
The Google Cloud location for your Vertex AI resources (e.g., 'us-central1'). This is required to specify the regional endpoint for the API.

keyInstructions.setupInfo:
To use the Veo on Vertex AI SDK, you need to set up Google Cloud authentication:

1. Install the Google Cloud SDK: https://cloud.google.com/sdk/docs/install
2. Authenticate with Google Cloud: Run `gcloud auth application-default login`
3. Set up your Google Cloud project and enable the Vertex AI API
4. Set the following environment variables:
   - GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT: Your Google Cloud project ID
   - GOOGLE_CLOUD_LOCATION: The location of your Vertex AI resources (e.g., "us-central1")

The SDK uses the Google Cloud access token for authentication. You don't need to manually provide the token, as the SDK will use the Google Cloud SDK to obtain it automatically.

Make sure you have the necessary permissions to access the Vertex AI API and the Veo models.

2. Authenticate with Google Cloud: Run `gcloud auth application-default login`
3. Set up your Google Cloud project and enable the Vertex AI API
4. Set the following environment variables:
   - GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT: Your Google Cloud project ID
   - GOOGLE_CLOUD_LOCATION: The location of your Vertex AI resources (e.g., "us-central1")

The SDK uses the Google Cloud access token for authentication. You don't need to manually provide the token, as the SDK will use the Google Cloud SDK to obtain it automatically.

Make sure you have the necessary permissions to access the Vertex AI API and the Veo models.
